this morning I have received an email saying that my account was suspended saying that my account has been leveled by botting.

I am the only person using my account and I have never used any other software as a robot to play the game. I have already used 5000 Australian dollars in this account. I hope you can activate my account as soon as possible!

I have been playing this game for about 5 years. I am really disappointed to say my account just gone missing. I have no idea why this happened!

Your prompt reply will be highly appreciated!
